org.apache.spark

Class WritableFactory<T>

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.WritableFactory<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class WritableFactory<T>
extends Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class encapsulating how to convert some type T to Writable. It stores both the Writable class corresponding to T (e.g. IntWritable for Int) and a function for doing the conversion. The Writable class will be used in SequenceFileRDDFunctions.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
